00538                 static bool mShuttingDown;
00539 
00551                 static void threadUpdate()
00552                 {
00553                         while(!mShuttingDown)
00554                         {
00555                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().processQueuedSounds();
00556                                 OgreOggSoundManager::getSingleton().updateBuffers();
00557                                 mUpdateThread->yield();
00558                         }
00559                 }

00561 #endif
